content:
Of course, let us proceed to the next level of the city. As we ascend the stairways to the next level, you will notice that the city becomes more fortified and the buildings become more grand. This level is known as the fifth circle and it's home to the Citadel, where the ruling class of Gondor resides.

The Citadel is the most impressive building in Minas Tirith, and it is here that you can find the throne room of the Steward of Gondor, as well as the Hall of Kings, where statues of the past Stewards of Gondor are displayed. You can also see the White Tree of Gondor, which is a symbol of the city and the royalty of Gondor.

In this level you will also find the barracks of the Citadel Guard, who are responsible for the security of the Citadel and the Steward of Gondor, and the armory where they store their weapons and armor.

Additionally, you can find the library of Minas Tirith, where many ancient books and scrolls are kept. The library is also a place of study for scholars, scribes, and historians.

Is there anything specific you would like to see or know about this level?
